title: Subspaces and spans in a left module

df-lss
blocks.content: Define the set of linear subspaces of a left module or left vector space. (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2013.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-lss(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(clss, cmpt(s0, universe, crab(s1, cdif(cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), csn(emptycls)), wral(s2, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, cv(s0))), wral(s3, cv(s1), wral(s4, cv(s1), wcel(co(co(cv(s2), cfv(cvsca, cv(s0)), cv(s3)), cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), cv(s4)), cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-lss(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ‚ä¢ LSubSp =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà(P((Base ` s0))\ { ‚àÖ })| ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà(Base `(Scalar ` s0)), ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s1, ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà s1,((s2[(√ó ` s0)]s3)[(+ ` s0)]s4)‚àà s1)))})
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
}

blocks.name: lssset
blocks.content: The set of all (not necessarily closed) linear subspaces of a left module or left vector space. (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:

} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c3), csn(emptycls)), wral(s1, c4, wral(s2, cv(s0), wral(s3, cv(s0), wcel(co(co(cv(s1), c5, cv(s2)), c6, cv(s3)), cv(s0)))))))), diffsc(s0, c4))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c3), csn(emptycls)), wral(s1, c4, wral(s2, cv(s0), wral(s3, cv(s0), wcel(co(co(cv(s1), c5, cv(s2)), c6, cv(s3)), cv(s0)))))))), diffsc(s0, c5))

  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c3), csn(emptycls)), wral(s1, c4, wral(s2, cv(s0), wral(s3, cv(s0), wcel(co(co(cv(s1), c5, cv(s2)), c6, cv(s3)), cv(s0)))))))), diffsc(s1, c4))
  syl5eq(c2, crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c3), csn(emptycls)), wral(s1, c4, wral(s2, cv(s0), wral(s3, cv(s0), wcel(co(co(cv(s1), c5, cv(s2)), c6, cv(s3)), cv(s0)))))), cfv(clss, c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(clss, c0), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c3), csn(emptycls)), wral(s1, c4, wral(s2, cv(s0), wral(s3, cv(s0), wcel(co(co(cv(s1), c5, cv(s2)), c6, cv(s3)), cv(s0))))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, clss, crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c3), csn(emptycls)), wral(s1, c4, wral(s2, cv(s0), wral(s3, cv(s0), wcel(co(co(cv(s1), c5, cv(s2)), c6, cv(s3)), cv(s0)))))), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), csn(emptycls)), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, cv(hs0))), wral(s2, cv(s0), wral(s3, cv(s0), wcel(co(co(cv(s1), cfv(cvsca, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s3)), cv(s0)))))))
  rabeqbidv(s0, cdif(cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), csn(emptycls)), cdif(cpw(c3), csn(emptycls)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, cv(hs0))), wral(s2, cv(s0), wral(s3, cv(s0), wcel(co(co(cv(s1), cfv(cvsca, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s3)), cv(s0))))), wral(s1, c4, wral(s2, cv(s0), wral(s3, cv(s0), wcel(co(co(cv(s1), c5, cv(s2)), c6, cv(s3)), cv(s0))))))

  eleq1d(co(co(cv(s1), cfv(cvsca, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s3)), cv(s0), co(co(cv(s1), c5, cv(s2)), c6, cv(s3)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))

  oveq1d(co(cv(s1), cfv(cvsca, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s3), co(cv(s1), c5, cv(s2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveqd(cv(s1), cfv(cvsca, cv(hs0)), cv(s2), c5, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cvsca, cv(hs0)), c5, cfv(cvsca, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))

thm lssset(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 = { s0 ‚àà(P(c3)\ { ‚àÖ })| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c4, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0, ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s0,((s1[c5]s2)[c6]s3)‚àà s0)))})
  ‚ä£ c7 =(Scalar ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c7)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(+ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(√ó ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(LSubSp ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)

  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, c0)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 = { s0 ‚àà(P(c3)\ { ‚àÖ })| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c4, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0, ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s0,((s1[c5]s2)[c6]s3)‚àà s0)))}), d(s0, c4))

  syl5eq(c2, { s0 ‚àà(P(c3)\ { ‚àÖ })| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c4, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0, ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s0,((s1[c5]s2)[c6]s3)‚àà s0)))}, (LSubSp ` c0), c0 ‚àà c1)
  syl(c0 ‚àà c1, (LSubSp ` c0)= { s0 ‚àà(P(c3)\ { ‚àÖ })| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c4, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0, ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s0,((s1[c5]s2)[c6]s3)‚àà s0)))}, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, clss, { s0 ‚àà(P(c3)\ { ‚àÖ })| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c4, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0, ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s0,((s1[c5]s2)[c6]s3)‚àà s0)))}, { s0 ‚àà(P((Base ` hs0))\ { ‚àÖ })| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(Base `(Scalar ` hs0)), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0, ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s0,((s1[(√ó ` hs0)]s2)[(+ ` hs0)]s3)‚àà s0)))})
  rabeqbidv(s0, (P((Base ` hs0))\ { ‚àÖ }), (P(c3)\ { ‚àÖ }), hs0 = c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(Base `(Scalar ` hs0)), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0, ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s0,((s1[(√ó ` hs0)]s2)[(+ ` hs0)]s3)‚àà s0))), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c4, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0, ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s0,((s1[c5]s2)[c6]s3)‚àà s0))))

  eqtrd(((s1[(√ó ` hs0)]s2)[(+ ` hs0)]s3), ((s1[c5]s2)[c6]s3), ((s1[c5]s2)[(+ ` hs0)]s3), hs0 = c0)
  oveq1d((s1[(√ó ` hs0)]s2), (+ ` hs0), s3, (s1[c5]s2), hs0 = c0)
  oveqd(s1, (√ó ` hs0), s2, c5, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((√ó ` hs0), c5, (√ó ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cvsca)
  oveqd((s1[c5]s2), (+ ` hs0), s3, c6, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((+ ` hs0), c6, (+ ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cplusg)
  df-lss(hs0, s0, s1, s2, s3)
  rabex(s0, (P(c3)\ { ‚àÖ }), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c4, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0, ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s0,((s1[c5]s2)[c6]s3)‚àà s0))))
  difexi(P(c3), { ‚àÖ })
  pwex(c3)
  fvexi(c3, cbs, c0)

  diff.cpw.s(s0, (Base ` hs0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, hs0)

  diffss.ex(s3, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s3)

blocks.name: islss
blocks.content: The predicate "is a subspace" (of a left module or left vector space). (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm islss(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wss(c0, c2), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c0, wcel(co(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), c5, cv(s2)), c0))))))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(csca, c7))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c7))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplusg, c7))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cvsca, c7))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clss, c7))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c7)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c7)
} = {
  pm5.21nii(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wss(c0, c2), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c0, wcel(co(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), c5, cv(s2)), c0))))), wcel(c7, universe))
  eleq2s(c0, c1, cfv(clss, c7), wcel(c7, universe))
  elfvex(c0, clss, c7)
  3adant3(wss(c0, c2), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c0, wcel(co(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), c5, cv(s2)), c0)))), wcel(c7, universe))

  simp3bi(wcel(c0, c1), wral(hs0, c3, wral(hs1, c0, wral(hs2, c0, wcel(co(co(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1)), c7, cv(hs2)), c0)))), wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c9)), wne(c0, emptycls))
  islss(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c9), c3, c6, c7, c8, c9)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c9))
  rspc3v(hs0, hs1, hs2, c2, c3, c4, c0, c5, c0, wcel(co(co(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1)), c7, cv(hs2)), c0), wcel(co(co(c2, c6, c4), c7, c5), c0), wcel(co(co(c2, c6, cv(hs1)), c7, cv(hs2)), c0), wcel(co(co(c2, c6, c4), c7, cv(hs2)), c0))
  eleq1d(co(co(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1)), c7, cv(hs2)), c0, co(co(c2, c6, cv(hs1)), c7, cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  oveq1d(co(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1)), c7, cv(hs2), co(c2, c6, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c2, c6, cv(hs1))

  oveq2(cv(hs2), c5, co(c2, c6, c4), c7)

  syl3anc(((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c1)), (c3[(+ ` c0)](((invg `(Scalar ` c0))`(1r `(Scalar ` c0)))[(√ó ` c0)]c4))=((((invg `(Scalar ` c0))`(1r `(Scalar ` c0)))[(√ó ` c0)]c4)[(+ ` c0)]c3), c0 ‚àà LMod, c3 ‚àà(Base ` c0), (((invg `(Scalar ` c0))`(1r `(Scalar ` c0)))[(√ó ` c0)]c4)‚àà(Base ` c0))

blocks.name: lssvancl1
blocks.content: Non-closure: if one vector belongs to a subspace but another does not, their sum does not belong. Useful for obtaining a new vector not in a subspace. TODO: notice similarity to ~ lspindp3 . Can it be used along with ~ lspsnne1 , ~ lspsnne2 to shorten this proof? (Contributed by NM, 14-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lssvancl1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wn(wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusg, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(clss, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, clmod))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c2, c3)))
} = {
  mtand(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), wcel(c2, c3))
  eqeltrrd(c2, c3, co(co(c0, c1, c2), cfv(csg, c5), c0), wa(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c2), cfv(csg, c5), c0), c2))
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c2), cfv(csg, c5), c0), c2), wcel(c5, cabl), wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c4))
  syl(w0, wcel(c5, cabl), wcel(c5, clmod))
  lmodabl(c5)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c3, c6), wcel(c0, c3))
  lssel(c3, c6, c0, c4, c5)
  ablpncan2(c5, c0, c4, c2, c1, cfv(csg, c5))
  syl22anc(wa(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3)), wcel(co(co(c0, c1, c2), cfv(csg, c5), c0), c3), wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c3, c6), wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), wcel(c0, c3))
  adantr(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), wcel(c5, clmod))
  adantr(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), wcel(c3, c6))
  simpr(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3))
  adantr(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), wcel(c0, c3))
  lssvsubcl(c5, c3, c6, co(c0, c1, c2), c0, cfv(csg, c5))
  eqid(cfv(csg, c5))
}

thm lssvancl1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí ¬¨(c0[c1]c2)‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c5)

  syl22anc((w0 ‚àß(c0[c1]c2)‚àà c3), ((c0[c1]c2)[(-g ` c5)]c0)‚àà c3, c5 ‚àà LMod, c3 ‚àà c6, (c0[c1]c2)‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà c3)
  adantr(w0, (c0[c1]c2)‚àà c3, c5 ‚àà LMod)
  adantr(w0, (c0[c1]c2)‚àà c3, c3 ‚àà c6)
  simpr(w0, (c0[c1]c2)‚àà c3)
  adantr(w0, (c0[c1]c2)‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà c3)
  lssvsubcl(c5, c3, c6, (c0[c1]c2), c0, (-g ` c5))
  eqid((-g ` c5))
}

blocks.name: lssvancl2
blocks.content: Non-closure: if one vector belongs to a subspace but another does not, their sum does not belong. Useful for obtaining a new vector not in a subspace. (Contributed by NM, 20-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lssvancl2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wn(wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusg, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(clss, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, clmod))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c0, c3)))
} = {
  eqneltrrd(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, co(c2, c1, c0), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(co(c2, c1, c0), co(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c2, c4), wcel(c0, c4))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c2, c4), wcel(c3, c6), wcel(c2, c3))
  lssel(c3, c6, c2, c4, c5)
  lmodcom(c5, c2, c4, c0, c1)
  lssvancl1(c2, c1, c0, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lssvancl2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí ¬¨(c0[c1]c2)‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(+ ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(LSubSp ` c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà LMod)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c3)
} = {
  eqneltrrd((c0[c1]c2), c3, (c2[c1]c0), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, (c2[c1]c0)=(c0[c1]c2), c5 ‚àà LMod, c2 ‚àà c4, c0 ‚àà c4)
  syl2anc(w0, c2 ‚àà c4, c3 ‚àà c6, c2 ‚àà c3)
  lssel(c3, c6, c2, c4, c5)
  lmodcom(c5, c2, c4, c0, c1)
  lssvancl1(c2, c1, c0, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
}

  simp1(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))

blocks.name: lss0ss
blocks.content: The zero subspace is included in every subspace. ( ~ sh0le analog.) (Contributed by NM, 27-Mar-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)

blocks.name: lssle0
blocks.content: No subspace is smaller than the zero subspace. ( ~ shle0 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 20-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)

blocks.name: lssne0
blocks.content: A nonzero subspace has a nonzero vector. ( ~ shne0i analog.) (Contributed by NM, 20-Apr-2014.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 8-Jan-2015.)

thm lssne0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wne(c0, csn(c2)), wrex(s0, c0, wne(cv(s0), c2))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c3))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clss, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wne(c0, csn(c2)), wrex(s0, c0, wne(cv(s0), c2)))), wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c3)))
  necon1abid(c0, csn(c2), wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, c0, wne(cv(s0), c2)))
  syl6rbb(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wrex(s0, c0, wne(cv(s0), c2))), wceq(c0, csn(c2)), wral(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c2)))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wceq(c0, csn(c2)), wral(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c2))), wne(c0, emptycls))
  lssn0(c0, c1, c3)
  eqsn(s0, c0, c2)
  bitr3i(wral(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c2)), wn(wrex(s0, c0, wne(cv(s0), c2))), wral(s0, c0, wn(wne(cv(s0), c2))))
  ralbii(s0, c0, wn(wne(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(cv(s0), c2))
  nne(cv(s0), c2)
  ralnex(s0, c0, wne(cv(s0), c2))
}

thm lssne0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c0 ‚â† { c2 } ‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚â† c2)))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(0 ` c3)

  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c0 ‚â† { c2 } ‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚â† c2))), c2 =(0 ` c3))
  necon1abid(c0, { c2 }, c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚â† c2))
  syl6rbb(c0 ‚àà c1, ¬¨ ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚â† c2), c0 = { c2 }, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 = c2))
  syl(c0 ‚àà c1, (c0 = { c2 } ‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 = c2)), c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  lssn0(c0, c1, c3)
  eqsn(s0, c0, c2)
  bitr3i(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 = c2), ¬¨ ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚â† c2), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ¬¨ s0 ‚â† c2))
  ralbii(s0, c0, ¬¨ s0 ‚â† c2, s0 = c2)
  nne(s0, c2)
  ralnex(s0, c0, s0 ‚â† c2)
}

blocks.name: lssvneln0
blocks.content: A vector ` X ` which doesn't belong to a subspace ` U ` is nonzero. (Contributed by NM, 14-May-2015.) (Revised by AV, 19-Jul-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm lssvneln0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wne(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(c0g, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(clss, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, clmod))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c0, c4)))
} = {
  mpd(w0, wne(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c0, c4)))
  necon3bd(c0, c1, w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  syl(w0, wi(wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c4)), wcel(c1, c4))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c2, clmod), wcel(c4, c3))
  lss0cl(c2, c4, c3, c1)
  eleq1a(c1, c4, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lssvneln0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚â† c1)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(0 ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(LSubSp ` c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà LMod)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c4)
} = {
  mpd(w0, c0 ‚â† c1, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c4)
  necon3bd(c0, c1, w0, c0 ‚àà c4)
  syl(w0, (c0 = c1 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4), c1 ‚àà c4)
  syl2anc(w0, c1 ‚àà c4, c2 ‚àà LMod, c4 ‚àà c3)
  lss0cl(c2, c4, c3, c1)
  eleq1a(c1, c4, c0)
}

blocks.name: lssssr
blocks.content: Conclude subspace ordering from nonzero vector membership. ( ~ ssrdv analog.) (Contributed by NM, 17-Aug-2014.) (Revised by AV, 13-Jul-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm lssssr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clss, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, clmod))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c5, csn(c2)))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  ssrdv(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  pm2.61dane(cv(s0), c2, w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  a1d(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  eqeltrd(cv(s0), c1, c2, wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c2)))
  simpr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c2))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c2), wcel(c2, c1))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, clmod), wcel(c1, c4))
  lss0cl(c3, c1, c4, c2)
  syld(wa(w0, wne(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  adantr(w0, wne(cv(s0), c2), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cv(s0), c0))))
  ancrd(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c5))
  sseld(cv(s0), c0, c5, w0)
  imp4b(w0, wne(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  com23(w0, wne(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c5), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  exp32(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5), wne(cv(s0), c2), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  sylan2br(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c5), wne(cv(s0), c2)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c5, csn(c2))))
  eldifsn(cv(s0), c5, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lssssr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚äÜ c1)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(0 ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(LSubSp ` c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà LMod)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚äÜ c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c5 \ { c2 }))‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  ssrdv(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  pm2.61dane(s0, c2, w0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c1))
  a1d((w0 ‚àß s0 = c2), s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚àà c1)
  eqeltrd(s0, c1, c2, (w0 ‚àß s0 = c2))
  simpr(w0, s0 = c2)
  adantr(w0, s0 = c2, c2 ‚àà c1)
  syl2anc(w0, c2 ‚àà c1, c3 ‚àà LMod, c1 ‚àà c4)
  lss0cl(c3, c1, c4, c2)
  syld((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚â† c2), s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚àà c1, (s0 ‚àà c5 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0))
  adantr(w0, s0 ‚â† c2, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c5 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0)))
  ancrd(w0, s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚àà c5)
  sseld(s0, c0, c5, w0)
  imp4b(w0, s0 ‚â† c2, s0 ‚àà c5, s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚àà c1)
  com23(w0, s0 ‚â† c2, s0 ‚àà c5, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c1))
  exp32(w0, s0 ‚àà c5, s0 ‚â† c2, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c1))
  sylan2br(w0, (s0 ‚àà c5 ‚àß s0 ‚â† c2), (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c1), s0 ‚àà(c5 \ { c2 }))
  eldifsn(s0, c5, c2)
}

blocks.name: lssvacl
blocks.content: Closure of vector addition in a subspace. (Contributed by NM, 11-Jan-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm lssvacl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wcel(co(c3, c5, c4), c1))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c0))
} = {
  eqeltrrd(co(c3, c5, c4), c1, co(co(cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cvsca, c0), c3), c5, c4), wa(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))))
  oveq1d(co(cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cvsca, c0), c3), c5, c4, c3, wa(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wceq(co(cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cvsca, c0), c3), c3), wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  simpll(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1)))
  ad2ant2lr(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  lssel(c1, c2, c3, cfv(cbs, c0), c0)
  lmodvs1(c0, c3, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cvsca, c0), cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  syl13anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wcel(co(co(cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cvsca, c0), c3), c5, c4), c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))
  simplr(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1)))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1)), wcel(cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))))
  lmod1cl(c0, cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)))
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))
  lsscl(c1, c2, cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)), c3, c4, cfv(cvsca, c0), c5, cfv(csca, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)))
  eqid(cfv(cvsca, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lssvacl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ (((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c1))‚Üí(c3[c5]c4)‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(+ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(LSubSp ` c0)
} = {
  eqeltrrd((c3[c5]c4), c1, (((1r `(Scalar ` c0))[(√ó ` c0)]c3)[c5]c4), ((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c1)))
  oveq1d(((1r `(Scalar ` c0))[(√ó ` c0)]c3), c5, c4, c3, ((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c1)))
  syl2anc(((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c1)), ((1r `(Scalar ` c0))[(√ó ` c0)]c3)= c3, c0 ‚àà LMod, c3 ‚àà(Base ` c0))
  simpll(c0 ‚àà LMod, c1 ‚àà c2, (c3 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c1))
  ad2ant2lr(c0 ‚àà LMod, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c1, c4 ‚àà c1, c3 ‚àà(Base ` c0))
  lssel(c1, c2, c3, (Base ` c0), c0)
  lmodvs1(c0, c3, (Base ` c0), (1r `(Scalar ` c0)), (√ó ` c0), (Scalar ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  syl13anc(((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c1)), (((1r `(Scalar ` c0))[(√ó ` c0)]c3)[c5]c4)‚àà c1, c1 ‚àà c2, (1r `(Scalar ` c0))‚àà(Base `(Scalar ` c0)), c3 ‚àà c1, c4 ‚àà c1)
  simplr(c0 ‚àà LMod, c1 ‚àà c2, (c3 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c1))
  ad2antrr(c0 ‚àà LMod, c1 ‚àà c2, (c3 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c1), (1r `(Scalar ` c0))‚àà(Base `(Scalar ` c0)))
  lmod1cl(c0, (1r `(Scalar ` c0)), (Base `(Scalar ` c0)), (Scalar ` c0))
  eqid((1r `(Scalar ` c0)))
  simprl((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), c3 ‚àà c1, c4 ‚àà c1)
  simprr((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), c3 ‚àà c1, c4 ‚àà c1)
  lsscl(c1, c2, (1r `(Scalar ` c0)), (Base `(Scalar ` c0)), c3, c4, (√ó ` c0), c5, (Scalar ` c0), c0)
  eqid((Scalar ` c0))
  eqid((Base `(Scalar ` c0)))
  eqid((√ó ` c0))
}

blocks.name: lssvscl
blocks.content: Closure of scalar product in a subspace. (Contributed by NM, 11-Jan-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm lssvscl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c1))), wcel(co(c3, c6, c5), c1))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cvsca, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c7))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c0))
} = {
  eqeltrrd(co(c3, c6, c5), c1, co(co(c3, c6, c5), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c0g, c0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c1))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c1))), wceq(co(co(c3, c6, c5), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c0g, c0)), co(c3, c6, c5)), wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(co(c3, c6, c5), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c1))), wcel(co(c3, c6, c5), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  simpll(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c1)))
  ad2ant2l(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c1), wcel(c5, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  lssel(c1, c2, c5, cfv(cbs, c0), c0)
  lmodvscl(c0, c3, c4, c5, cfv(cbs, c0), c6, c7)
  lmod0vrid(c0, co(c3, c6, c5), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c0g, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  syl13anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c1))), wcel(co(co(c3, c6, c5), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c0g, c0)), c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c1), wcel(cfv(c0g, c0), c1))
  simplr(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c1)))
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c1))
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c1))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c1)), wcel(cfv(c0g, c0), c1))
  lss0cl(c0, c1, c2, cfv(c0g, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  lsscl(c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, cfv(c0g, c0), c6, cfv(cplusg, c0), c7, c0)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lssvscl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ‚ä¢ (((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c1))‚Üí(c3[c6]c5)‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(Scalar ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(√ó ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c7)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(LSubSp ` c0)
} = {
  eqeltrrd((c3[c6]c5), c1, ((c3[c6]c5)[(+ ` c0)](0 ` c0)), ((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c1)))
  syl2anc(((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c1)), ((c3[c6]c5)[(+ ` c0)](0 ` c0))=(c3[c6]c5), c0 ‚àà LMod, (c3[c6]c5)‚àà(Base ` c0))
  syl3anc(((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c1)), (c3[c6]c5)‚àà(Base ` c0), c0 ‚àà LMod, c3 ‚àà c4, c5 ‚àà(Base ` c0))
  simpll(c0 ‚àà LMod, c1 ‚àà c2, (c3 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c1))
  ad2ant2l(c0 ‚àà LMod, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c4, c5 ‚àà c1, c5 ‚àà(Base ` c0))
  lssel(c1, c2, c5, (Base ` c0), c0)
  lmodvscl(c0, c3, c4, c5, (Base ` c0), c6, c7)
  lmod0vrid(c0, (c3[c6]c5), (Base ` c0), (+ ` c0), (0 ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  syl13anc(((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c1)), ((c3[c6]c5)[(+ ` c0)](0 ` c0))‚àà c1, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c4, c5 ‚àà c1, (0 ` c0)‚àà c1)
  simplr(c0 ‚àà LMod, c1 ‚àà c2, (c3 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c1))
  simprl((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), c3 ‚àà c4, c5 ‚àà c1)
  simprr((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), c3 ‚àà c4, c5 ‚àà c1)
  adantr((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (c3 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c1), (0 ` c0)‚àà c1)
  lss0cl(c0, c1, c2, (0 ` c0))
  eqid((0 ` c0))
  lsscl(c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, (0 ` c0), c6, (+ ` c0), c7, c0)
  eqid((+ ` c0))
}

blocks.name: lssvnegcl
blocks.content: Closure of negative vectors in a subspace. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 11-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm lssvnegcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(cfv(c4, c3), c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cminusg, c0))
} = {

blocks.name: lsslss

blocks.name: lssintcl
blocks.content: The intersection of a nonempty set of subspaces is a subspace. (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)

blocks.name: lssincl
blocks.content: The intersection of two subspaces is a subspace. (Contributed by NM, 7-Mar-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm lssincl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(cin(c1, c3), c2))

} = {
  eqeltrrd(cin(c1, c3), c2, cint(cpr(c1, c3)), w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(cint(cpr(c1, c3)), cin(c1, c3)))
  intprg(c1, c2, c3, c2)
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(cint(cpr(c1, c3)), c2), wcel(c0, clmod), wss(cpr(c1, c3), c2), wne(cpr(c1, c3), emptycls))
  simp1(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wss(cpr(c1, c3), c2))
  prssi(c1, c2, c3)
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(cpr(c1, c3), emptycls))
  prnzg(c1, c2, c3)
  lssintcl(c0, cpr(c1, c3), c2)
}

blocks.name: prdsvscacl
blocks.content: Pointwise scalar multiplication is closed in products of modules. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Jan-2015.)

thm prdsvscacl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c5, cprds, c6))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cvsca, c4))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, crg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c8, c9))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c6, c8, clmod))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c8)), wceq(cfv(csca, cfv(c6, cv(s0))), c5))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
  -| diffsc(s0, c9)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3)), diffsc(s0, c7))
  eqeltrd(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, cmpt(s0, c8, co(c0, cfv(cvsca, cfv(c6, cv(s0))), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), w0)

  mpbird(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c8, co(c0, cfv(cvsca, cfv(c6, cv(s0))), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), c3), wral(s0, c8, wcel(co(c0, cfv(cvsca, cfv(c6, cv(s0))), cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cfv(cbs, cfv(c6, cv(s0))))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c8, w0, wcel(co(c0, cfv(cvsca, cfv(c6, cv(s0))), cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cfv(cbs, cfv(c6, cv(s0)))))

  ffvelrnda(cv(s0), c8, c6, clmod, w0)
  eleqtrrd(c0, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, cfv(c6, cv(s0)))), c7, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c8)))

thm pwslmod(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, clmod))

  eqid(co(cfv(csca, c0), cprds, cxp(c1, csn(c0))))

  adantlr(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cfv(cxp(c1, csn(c0)), cv(hs0)), c0))
  fvconst2g(c0, clmod, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(co(cfv(csca, c0), cprds, cxp(c1, csn(c0))))

thm lspfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))

} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, cpw(c3), cint(crab(s1, c4, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), diffsc(s0, c4))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, cpw(c3), cint(crab(s1, c4, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), diffsc(s1, c3))
  syl5eq(c2, cmpt(s0, cpw(c3), cint(crab(s1, c4, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), cfv(clspn, c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(clspn, c0), cmpt(s0, cpw(c3), cint(crab(s1, c4, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, clspn, cmpt(s0, cpw(c3), cint(crab(s1, c4, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), cmpt(s0, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), cint(crab(s1, cfv(clss, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  mpteq12dv(s0, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), cint(crab(s1, cfv(clss, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), cpw(c3), cint(crab(s1, c4, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  pweqd(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbs)
  inteqd(crab(s1, cfv(clss, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))), crab(s1, c4, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(crab(s1, cfv(clss, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))), crab(s1, c4, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cfv(clss, cv(hs0)), c4))
  syl6eqr(cfv(clss, cv(hs0)), c4, cfv(clss, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, clss)
  rabeq(s1, cfv(clss, cv(hs0)), c4, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  df-lsp(hs0, s0, s1)
  mptex(s0, cpw(c3), cint(crab(s1, c4, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  pwex(c3)
  fvexi(c3, cbs, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, cpw(c3), cint(crab(s1, c4, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)

thm lspfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =(s0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ ‚ãÇ { s1 ‚àà c4 | s0 ‚äÜ s1 }))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c0)

  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =(s0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ ‚ãÇ { s1 ‚àà c4 | s0 ‚äÜ s1 })), d(s0, c4))

  syl5eq(c2, (s0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ ‚ãÇ { s1 ‚àà c4 | s0 ‚äÜ s1 }), (LSpan ` c0), c0 ‚àà c1)
  syl(c0 ‚àà c1, (LSpan ` c0)=(s0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ ‚ãÇ { s1 ‚àà c4 | s0 ‚äÜ s1 }), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, clspn, (s0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ ‚ãÇ { s1 ‚àà c4 | s0 ‚äÜ s1 }), (s0 ‚àà P((Base ` hs0))‚Ü¶ ‚ãÇ { s1 ‚àà(LSubSp ` hs0)| s0 ‚äÜ s1 }))
  mpteq12dv(s0, P((Base ` hs0)), ‚ãÇ { s1 ‚àà(LSubSp ` hs0)| s0 ‚äÜ s1 }, P(c3), ‚ãÇ { s1 ‚àà c4 | s0 ‚äÜ s1 }, hs0 = c0)
  pweqd((Base ` hs0), c3, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c3, (Base ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cbs)
  inteqd({ s1 ‚àà(LSubSp ` hs0)| s0 ‚äÜ s1 }, { s1 ‚àà c4 | s0 ‚äÜ s1 }, hs0 = c0)
  syl(hs0 = c0, { s1 ‚àà(LSubSp ` hs0)| s0 ‚äÜ s1 } = { s1 ‚àà c4 | s0 ‚äÜ s1 }, (LSubSp ` hs0)= c4)
  syl6eqr((LSubSp ` hs0), c4, (LSubSp ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, clss)
  rabeq(s1, (LSubSp ` hs0), c4, s0 ‚äÜ s1)
  df-lsp(hs0, s0, s1)
  mptex(s0, P(c3), ‚ãÇ { s1 ‚àà c4 | s0 ‚äÜ s1 })
  pwex(c3)
  fvexi(c3, cbs, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ ‚ãÇ { s1 ‚àà c4 | s0 ‚äÜ s1 }))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

  diff.cfv.s(s1, clss, hs0)

blocks.name: lspf
blocks.content: The span operator on a left module maps subsets to subsets. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm lspf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wf(c1, cpw(c2), c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(clss, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clspn, c0))
} = {
  fmpt3d(hs0, c1, cpw(c2), c3, cint(crab(hs1, c3, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), wcel(c0, clmod))
  lspfval(hs0, hs1, c0, clmod, c1, c2, c3)
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c2))), wcel(cint(crab(hs1, c3, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), c3), wcel(c0, clmod), wss(crab(hs1, c3, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), c3), wne(crab(hs1, c3, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), emptycls))
  simpl(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c2)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c2))), wss(crab(hs1, c3, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), c3))
  ssrab2(hs1, c3, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c2))), wne(crab(hs1, c3, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), emptycls), wrex(hs1, c3, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c2)), wrex(hs1, c3, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wcel(c2, c3), wss(cv(hs0), c2))
  lss1(c0, c2, c3)
  elpwi(cv(hs0), c2)
  rspcev(hs1, c2, c3, wss(cv(hs0), c2), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  sseq2(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0))
  rabn0(hs1, c3, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  lssintcl(c0, crab(hs1, c3, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)

  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.w(wss(cv(hs0), c2))

thm lspf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚Üí(c1 : P(c2)‚Üí c3))

thm lspval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c3, c1), cint(crab(s0, c4, wss(c1, cv(s0))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clss, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(clspn, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(c3, c1), cint(crab(s0, c4, wss(c1, cv(s0)))), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cpw(c2), cint(crab(s0, c4, wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), c1), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(c1, c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cpw(c2), cint(crab(s0, c4, wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), c1)))
  fveq1d(c3, c1, cmpt(hs0, cpw(c2), cint(crab(s0, c4, wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), wcel(c0, clmod))
  lspfval(hs0, s0, c0, clmod, c3, c2, c4)
  fvmptd3(hs0, cmpt(hs0, cpw(c2), cint(crab(s0, c4, wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), c1, cint(crab(s0, c4, wss(c1, cv(s0)))), cpw(c2), cint(crab(s0, c4, wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), universe, wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(c1, c2)))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cpw(c2), cint(crab(s0, c4, wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))))
  inteqd(crab(s0, c4, wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), crab(s0, c4, wss(c1, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  rabbidv(s0, c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(c1, cv(s0)))
  sseq1(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0))

  simpr(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(c1, c2))
  elpw2(c1, c2)
  fvexi(c2, cbs, c0)
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(cint(crab(s0, c4, wss(c1, cv(s0)))), universe), wrex(s0, c4, wss(c1, cv(s0))))
  sylan(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(c1, c2), wrex(s0, c4, wss(c1, cv(s0))), wcel(c2, c4))
  lss1(c0, c2, c4)

  simp1(c0 ‚àà LMod, c1 ‚äÜ c2, c3 ‚äÜ c1)

  simp2(c0 ‚àà LMod, c1 ‚äÜ c2, c3 ‚äÜ c1)
  lspval(hs0, c0, c3, c2, c4, (LSubSp ` c0))
  3adant3(c0 ‚àà LMod, c1 ‚äÜ c2, c3 ‚äÜ c1, (c4 ` c1)= ‚ãÇ { hs0 ‚àà(LSubSp ` c0)| c1 ‚äÜ hs0 })
  lspval(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c4, (LSubSp ` c0))
  eqid((LSubSp ` c0))

  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((LSubSp ` c0))

blocks.name: lspssid
blocks.content: A set of vectors is a subset of its span. ( ~ spanss2 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 6-Feb-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)

blocks.name: lspidm
blocks.content: The span of a set of vectors is idempotent. (Contributed by NM, 22-Feb-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)

blocks.name: lspun
blocks.content: The span of union is the span of the union of spans. (Contributed by NM, 22-Feb-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm lspun(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wceq(cfv(c4, cun(c1, c3)), cfv(c4, cun(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(c4, c3)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clspn, c0))
} = {
  eqssd(cfv(c4, cun(c1, c3)), cfv(c4, cun(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(c4, c3))), w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)))

  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wss(c1, cfv(c4, c1)), wcel(c0, clmod), wss(c1, c2))
  lspssid(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  lspssid(c0, c3, c2, c4)
  unss12(c1, cfv(c4, c1), c3, cfv(c4, c3))

  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wss(cfv(c4, cun(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(c4, c3))), cfv(c4, cfv(c4, cun(c1, c3)))), wcel(c0, clmod), wss(cfv(c4, cun(c1, c3)), c2), wss(cun(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(c4, c3)), cfv(c4, cun(c1, c3))))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wss(cfv(c4, cun(c1, c3)), c2), wcel(c0, clmod), wss(cun(c1, c3), c2))
  lspssv(c0, cun(c1, c3), c2, c4)

  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wss(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(c4, cun(c1, c3))), wcel(c0, clmod), wss(cun(c1, c3), c2), wss(c1, cun(c1, c3)))
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wss(c1, cun(c1, c3)))
  ssun1(c1, c3)
  lspss(c0, cun(c1, c3), c2, c1, c4)
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wss(cfv(c4, c3), cfv(c4, cun(c1, c3))), wcel(c0, clmod), wss(cun(c1, c3), c2), wss(c3, cun(c1, c3)))
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wss(c3, cun(c1, c3)))

  lspss(c0, cun(c1, c3), c2, c3, c4)

  simp1(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2))
  unssd(c1, c3, c2, w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)))
  simp2(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2))
  simp3(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2))
  lspidm(c0, cun(c1, c3), c2, c4)

blocks.pretty:
thm lspun(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c2)‚Üí(c4 `(c1 ‚ãÉ c3))=(c4 `((c4 ` c1)‚ãÉ(c4 ` c3))))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)

} = {
  eqssd((c4 `(c1 ‚ãÉ c3)), (c4 `((c4 ` c1)‚ãÉ(c4 ` c3))), (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c2))
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c2), (c4 `(c1 ‚ãÉ c3))‚äÜ(c4 `((c4 ` c1)‚ãÉ(c4 ` c3))), c0 ‚àà LMod, ((c4 ` c1)‚ãÉ(c4 ` c3))‚äÜ c2, (c1 ‚ãÉ c3)‚äÜ((c4 ` c1)‚ãÉ(c4 ` c3)))
  sstrd(((c4 ` c1)‚ãÉ(c4 ` c3)), c2, (c4 `(c1 ‚ãÉ c3)), (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c2))
  3imp3i2an(c0 ‚àà LMod, c1 ‚äÜ c2, c3 ‚äÜ c2, (c1 ‚ãÉ c3)‚äÜ((c4 ` c1)‚ãÉ(c4 ` c3)), c1 ‚äÜ(c4 ` c1), c3 ‚äÜ(c4 ` c3))
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c2), c1 ‚äÜ(c4 ` c1), c0 ‚àà LMod, c1 ‚äÜ c2)
  lspssid(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  lspssid(c0, c3, c2, c4)
  unss12(c1, (c4 ` c1), c3, (c4 ` c3))
  lspss(c0, ((c4 ` c1)‚ãÉ(c4 ` c3)), c2, (c1 ‚ãÉ c3), c4)
  sseqtrd((c4 `((c4 ` c1)‚ãÉ(c4 ` c3))), (c4 `(c1 ‚ãÉ c3)), (c4 `(c4 `(c1 ‚ãÉ c3))), (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c2))
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c2), (c4 `((c4 ` c1)‚ãÉ(c4 ` c3)))‚äÜ(c4 `(c4 `(c1 ‚ãÉ c3))), c0 ‚àà LMod, (c4 `(c1 ‚ãÉ c3))‚äÜ c2, ((c4 ` c1)‚ãÉ(c4 ` c3))‚äÜ(c4 `(c1 ‚ãÉ c3)))
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c2), (c4 `(c1 ‚ãÉ c3))‚äÜ c2, c0 ‚àà LMod, (c1 ‚ãÉ c3)‚äÜ c2)
  lspssv(c0, (c1 ‚ãÉ c3), c2, c4)
  unssd((c4 ` c1), (c4 ` c3), (c4 `(c1 ‚ãÉ c3)), (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c2))
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c2), (c4 ` c1)‚äÜ(c4 `(c1 ‚ãÉ c3)), c0 ‚àà LMod, (c1 ‚ãÉ c3)‚äÜ c2, c1 ‚äÜ(c1 ‚ãÉ c3))
  a1i((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c2), c1 ‚äÜ(c1 ‚ãÉ c3))
  ssun1(c1, c3)

blocks.name: lspssp
blocks.content: If a set of vectors is a subset of a subspace, then the span of those vectors is also contained in the subspace. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: mrclsp
blocks.content: Moore closure generalizes module span. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mrclsp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(clss, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clspn, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmrc, c3))
} = {
  eqtr4d(c1, c2, cmpt(hs0, cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), cint(crab(hs1, c3, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wcel(c0, clmod))
  lspfval(hs0, hs1, c0, clmod, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), c3)
  syl(wcel(c0, clmod), wceq(c2, cmpt(hs0, cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), cint(crab(hs1, c3, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))), wcel(c3, cfv(cmre, cfv(cbs, c0))))
  lssmre(c0, c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  mrcfval(hs0, hs1, c3, cfv(cbs, c0), c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mrclsp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚Üí c1 = c2)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(LSubSp ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(LSpan ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(mrCls ` c3)
} = {
  eqtr4d(c1, c2, (hs0 ‚àà P((Base ` c0))‚Ü¶ ‚ãÇ { hs1 ‚àà c3 | hs0 ‚äÜ hs1 }), c0 ‚àà LMod)
  lspfval(hs0, hs1, c0, clmod, c1, (Base ` c0), c3)
  syl(c0 ‚àà LMod, c2 =(hs0 ‚àà P((Base ` c0))‚Ü¶ ‚ãÇ { hs1 ‚àà c3 | hs0 ‚äÜ hs1 }), c3 ‚àà(Moore `(Base ` c0)))
  lssmre(c0, c3, (Base ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  mrcfval(hs0, hs1, c3, (Base ` c0), c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: lspsnss
blocks.content: The span of the singleton of a subspace member is included in the subspace. ( ~ spansnss analog.) (Contributed by NM, 9-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: lspsnel3
blocks.content: A member of the span of the singleton of a vector is a member of a subspace containing the vector. ( ~ elspansn3 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 4-Jul-2014.)

blocks.name: lspprss
blocks.content: The span of a pair of vectors in a subspace belongs to the subspace. (Contributed by NM, 12-Jan-2015.)

blocks.name: lspsnid
blocks.content: A vector belongs to the span of its singleton. ( ~ spansnid analog.) (Contributed by NM, 9-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)

blocks.name: lspsnel6
blocks.content: Relationship between a vector and the 1-dim (or 0-dim) subspace it generates. (Contributed by NM, 8-Aug-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lspsnel6(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wss(cfv(c3, csn(c0)), c1))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(clss, c4))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(clspn, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, clmod))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c5))
} = {
  impbida(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wss(cfv(c3, csn(c0)), c1)))
  jca(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(c0, c2), wss(cfv(c3, csn(c0)), c1))
  sylan(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c5))
  lssel(c1, c5, c0, c2, c4)
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wss(cfv(c3, csn(c0)), c1), wcel(c4, clmod), wcel(c1, c5), wcel(c0, c1))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c4, clmod))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c5))
  simpr(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  lspsnss(c4, c1, c5, c0, c3)
  impr(w0, wcel(c0, c2), wss(cfv(c3, csn(c0)), c1), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl5com(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, csn(c0)), c1), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(c3, csn(c0))))
  sylan(w0, wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c0, cfv(c3, csn(c0))), wcel(c4, clmod))
  lspsnid(c4, c0, c2, c3)
  ssel(cfv(c3, csn(c0)), c1, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lspsnel6(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß(c3 ` { c0 })‚äÜ c1)))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(LSubSp ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(LSpan ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà LMod)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c5)
} = {
  impbida(w0, c0 ‚àà c1, (c0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß(c3 ` { c0 })‚äÜ c1))
  jca((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1), c0 ‚àà c2, (c3 ` { c0 })‚äÜ c1)
  sylan(w0, c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà c2, c1 ‚àà c5)
  lssel(c1, c5, c0, c2, c4)
  syl3anc((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1), (c3 ` { c0 })‚äÜ c1, c4 ‚àà LMod, c1 ‚àà c5, c0 ‚àà c1)
  adantr(w0, c0 ‚àà c1, c4 ‚àà LMod)
  adantr(w0, c0 ‚àà c1, c1 ‚àà c5)
  simpr(w0, c0 ‚àà c1)
  lspsnss(c4, c1, c5, c0, c3)
  impr(w0, c0 ‚àà c2, (c3 ` { c0 })‚äÜ c1, c0 ‚àà c1)
  syl5com((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c2), (c3 ` { c0 })‚äÜ c1, c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà(c3 ` { c0 }))
  sylan(w0, c0 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà(c3 ` { c0 }), c4 ‚àà LMod)
  lspsnid(c4, c0, c2, c3)
  ssel((c3 ` { c0 }), c1, c0)
}

blocks.name: lspsnel5
blocks.content: Relationship between a vector and the 1-dim (or 0-dim) subspace it generates. (Contributed by NM, 8-Aug-2014.)

blocks.name: lspsnel5a
blocks.content: Relationship between a vector and the 1-dim (or 0-dim) subspace it generates. (Contributed by NM, 20-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lspsnel5a(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(clss, c4))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(clspn, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, clmod))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
} = {
  mpbid(w0, wss(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  lspsnel5(c1, c2, c0, cfv(cbs, c4), c4, c3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c4)), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c1, c2))
  lssel(c2, c3, c1, cfv(cbs, c4), c4)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c4))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lspsnel5a(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` { c1 })‚äÜ c2)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(LSubSp ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(LSpan ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà LMod)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c2)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, (c0 ` { c1 })‚äÜ c2, c1 ‚àà c2)
  lspsnel5(c1, c2, c0, (Base ` c4), c4, c3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, c1 ‚àà(Base ` c4), c2 ‚àà c3, c1 ‚àà c2)
  lssel(c2, c3, c1, (Base ` c4), c4)
  eqid((Base ` c4))
}

blocks.name: lssats2
blocks.content: A way to express atomisticity (a subspace is the union of its atoms). (Contributed by NM, 3-Feb-2015.)

thm lssats2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, ciun(s0, c0, cfv(c1, csn(cv(s0))))))

  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clspn, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, clmod))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, c0, ciun(s0, c0, cfv(c1, csn(cv(s0)))), w0)
  syl6bbr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(s0, c0, cfv(c1, csn(cv(s0))))), wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c1, csn(cv(s0))))))
  impbid(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c1, csn(cv(s0))))))

  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c1, csn(cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))), wcel(c3, clmod), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c3, clmod))
  sylan(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3)), wcel(c0, c2))
  lssel(c0, c2, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3), c3)
  lspsnid(c3, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3), c1)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c3))
  rspcev(s0, cv(hs0), c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c1, csn(cv(s0)))))
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), cfv(c1, csn(cv(s0))), cfv(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  fveq2d(c1, csn(cv(s0)), csn(cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  sneq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  rexlimdva(s0, c0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c1, csn(cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  sseld(cv(hs0), cfv(c1, csn(cv(s0))), c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  lspsnel5a(c1, cv(s0), c0, c2, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c3, clmod))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c0, c2))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  eliun(s0, cv(hs0), c0, cfv(c1, csn(cv(s0))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ciun(s0, c0, cfv(c1, csn(cv(s0)))))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(c1, csn(cv(hs0))))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1, csn(cv(hs0)))
  diff.csn.s(s0, cv(hs0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 = ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` { s0 })))

  fveq2d(c1, { s0 }, { hs0 }, s0 = hs0)
  sneq(s0, hs0)

  lspsnel5a(c3, c1, cab(s0, wrex(s1, c4, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c5, c1)))), cfv(clss, c0), c0, wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)))

  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c1, cab(s0, wrex(s1, c4, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c5, c1))))), wrex(s1, c4, wceq(c1, co(cv(s1), c5, c1))))
  syl2an2r(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wrex(s1, c4, wceq(c1, co(cv(s1), c5, c1))), wcel(cfv(cur, c6), c4), wceq(c1, co(cfv(cur, c6), c5, c1)))
  lmod1cl(c0, cfv(cur, c6), c4, c6)

  oveq1(cv(s1), cfv(cur, c6), c5, c1)
  adantl(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wb(wcel(c1, cab(s0, wrex(s1, c4, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c5, c1))))), wrex(s1, c4, wceq(c1, co(cv(s1), c5, c1)))))
  elabg(s0, c1, c2, wrex(s1, c4, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c5, c1))), wrex(s1, c4, wceq(c1, co(cv(s1), c5, c1))))

  eqeq1(cv(s0), c1, co(cv(s1), c5, c1))
  abssdv(s0, cfv(c3, csn(c1)), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wrex(s1, c4, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c5, c1))))
  rexlimdva(s1, c4, wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c5, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(c3, csn(c1))))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s1), c4)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c5, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(c3, csn(c1)))), wcel(co(cv(s1), c5, c1), cfv(c3, csn(c1))))
  syl22anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s1), c4)), wcel(co(cv(s1), c5, c1), cfv(c3, csn(c1))), wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(cfv(c3, csn(c1)), cfv(clss, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c4), wcel(c1, cfv(c3, csn(c1))))

  lspsncl(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(clss, c0))

thm lspsnel(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {

  eleq2d(c3, cfv(c4, csn(c1)), cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c5, wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), c6, c1)))), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)))

thm lspsnss2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {

} = {

blocks.name: lspsnneg
blocks.content: Negation does not change the span of a singleton. (Contributed by NM, 24-Apr-2014.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm lspsnneg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))

} = {
  eqssd(cfv(c3, csn(cfv(c4, c1))), cfv(c3, csn(c1)), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)))
  eqsstr3d(cfv(c3, csn(cfv(c4, c1))), cfv(c3, csn(c1)), cfv(c3, csn(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0))), cfv(cvsca, c0), c1))), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)))
  fveq2d(c3, csn(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0))), cfv(cvsca, c0), c1)), csn(cfv(c4, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)))
  sneqd(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0))), cfv(cvsca, c0), c1), cfv(c4, c1), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)))
  lmodvneg1(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cminusg, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cvsca, c0), c4, cfv(csca, c0))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, csn(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0))), cfv(cvsca, c0), c1))), cfv(c3, csn(c1))), wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0))), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpr(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2))
  lspsnvsi(c0, cfv(cfv(cminusg, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0))), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)), c1, c2, c3, cfv(cvsca, c0), cfv(csca, c0))
  eqsstr3d(cfv(c3, csn(c1)), cfv(c3, csn(cfv(c4, c1))), cfv(c3, csn(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0))), cfv(cvsca, c0), cfv(c4, c1)))), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)))
  fveq2d(c3, csn(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0))), cfv(cvsca, c0), cfv(c4, c1))), csn(c1), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)))
  sneqd(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0))), cfv(cvsca, c0), cfv(c4, c1)), c1, wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)))
  eqtrd(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0))), cfv(cvsca, c0), cfv(c4, c1)), c1, cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)))
  syldan(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0))), cfv(cvsca, c0), cfv(c4, c1)), cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1))), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c2))
  lmodvneg1(c0, cfv(c4, c1), c2, cfv(cminusg, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cvsca, c0), c4, cfv(csca, c0))
  sylan(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1)), c1), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  lmodgrp(c0)
  grpinvinv(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, csn(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0))), cfv(cvsca, c0), cfv(c4, c1)))), cfv(c3, csn(cfv(c4, c1)))), wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0))), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0))), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0))), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), cgrp), wcel(cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))))
  lmodfgrp(c0, cfv(csca, c0))

  eqid(cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)))
  grpinvcl(cfv(csca, c0), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cminusg, cfv(csca, c0)))
  eqid(cfv(cminusg, cfv(csca, c0)))
  lmodvnegcl(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  lspsnvsi(c0, cfv(cfv(cminusg, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0))), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(c4, c1), c2, c3, cfv(cvsca, c0), cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)))

thm lspsnneg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c3 ` {(c4 ` c1)})=(c3 ` { c1 }))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(invg ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(LSpan ` c0)
} = {
  eqssd((c3 ` {(c4 ` c1)}), (c3 ` { c1 }), (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  eqsstr3d((c3 ` {(c4 ` c1)}), (c3 ` { c1 }), (c3 ` {(((invg `(Scalar ` c0))`(1r `(Scalar ` c0)))[(√ó ` c0)]c1)}), (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  fveq2d(c3, {(((invg `(Scalar ` c0))`(1r `(Scalar ` c0)))[(√ó ` c0)]c1)}, {(c4 ` c1)}, (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  sneqd((((invg `(Scalar ` c0))`(1r `(Scalar ` c0)))[(√ó ` c0)]c1), (c4 ` c1), (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  lmodvneg1(c0, c1, c2, (invg `(Scalar ` c0)), (1r `(Scalar ` c0)), (√ó ` c0), c4, (Scalar ` c0))
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (c3 ` {(((invg `(Scalar ` c0))`(1r `(Scalar ` c0)))[(√ó ` c0)]c1)})‚äÜ(c3 ` { c1 }), c0 ‚àà LMod, ((invg `(Scalar ` c0))`(1r `(Scalar ` c0)))‚àà(Base `(Scalar ` c0)), c1 ‚àà c2)
  simpr(c0 ‚àà LMod, c1 ‚àà c2)
  lspsnvsi(c0, ((invg `(Scalar ` c0))`(1r `(Scalar ` c0))), (Base `(Scalar ` c0)), c1, c2, c3, (√ó ` c0), (Scalar ` c0))
  eqsstr3d((c3 ` { c1 }), (c3 ` {(c4 ` c1)}), (c3 ` {(((invg `(Scalar ` c0))`(1r `(Scalar ` c0)))[(√ó ` c0)](c4 ` c1))}), (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  fveq2d(c3, {(((invg `(Scalar ` c0))`(1r `(Scalar ` c0)))[(√ó ` c0)](c4 ` c1))}, { c1 }, (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  sneqd((((invg `(Scalar ` c0))`(1r `(Scalar ` c0)))[(√ó ` c0)](c4 ` c1)), c1, (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  eqtrd((((invg `(Scalar ` c0))`(1r `(Scalar ` c0)))[(√ó ` c0)](c4 ` c1)), c1, (c4 `(c4 ` c1)), (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  syldan(c0 ‚àà LMod, c1 ‚àà c2, (((invg `(Scalar ` c0))`(1r `(Scalar ` c0)))[(√ó ` c0)](c4 ` c1))=(c4 `(c4 ` c1)), (c4 ` c1)‚àà c2)
  lmodvneg1(c0, (c4 ` c1), c2, (invg `(Scalar ` c0)), (1r `(Scalar ` c0)), (√ó ` c0), c4, (Scalar ` c0))
  sylan(c0 ‚àà LMod, c1 ‚àà c2, (c4 `(c4 ` c1))= c1, c0 ‚àà Grp)
  lmodgrp(c0)
  grpinvinv(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (c3 ` {(((invg `(Scalar ` c0))`(1r `(Scalar ` c0)))[(√ó ` c0)](c4 ` c1))})‚äÜ(c3 ` {(c4 ` c1)}), c0 ‚àà LMod, ((invg `(Scalar ` c0))`(1r `(Scalar ` c0)))‚àà(Base `(Scalar ` c0)), (c4 ` c1)‚àà c2)
  simpl(c0 ‚àà LMod, c1 ‚àà c2)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà LMod, c1 ‚àà c2, ((invg `(Scalar ` c0))`(1r `(Scalar ` c0)))‚àà(Base `(Scalar ` c0)))
  syl2anc(c0 ‚àà LMod, ((invg `(Scalar ` c0))`(1r `(Scalar ` c0)))‚àà(Base `(Scalar ` c0)), (Scalar ` c0)‚àà Grp, (1r `(Scalar ` c0))‚àà(Base `(Scalar ` c0)))
  lmodfgrp(c0, (Scalar ` c0))
  lmod1cl(c0, (1r `(Scalar ` c0)), (Base `(Scalar ` c0)), (Scalar ` c0))
  eqid((1r `(Scalar ` c0)))
  grpinvcl((Scalar ` c0), (1r `(Scalar ` c0)), (Base `(Scalar ` c0)), (invg `(Scalar ` c0)))

  lspsnvsi(c0, ((invg `(Scalar ` c0))`(1r `(Scalar ` c0))), (Base `(Scalar ` c0)), (c4 ` c1), c2, c3, (√ó ` c0), (Scalar ` c0))
  eqid((Scalar ` c0))
  eqid((Base `(Scalar ` c0)))

blocks.name: lspsnsub
blocks.content: Swapping subtraction order does not change the span of a singleton. (Contributed by NM, 4-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lspsnsub(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, csn(co(c1, c2, c3))), cfv(c0, csn(co(c3, c2, c1)))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(csg, c5))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(clspn, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, clmod))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
} = {
  eqtr3d(cfv(c0, csn(co(c1, c2, c3))), cfv(c0, csn(co(c3, c2, c1))), cfv(c0, csn(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c5), co(c1, c2, c3)))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, csn(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c5), co(c1, c2, c3)))), cfv(c0, csn(co(c1, c2, c3)))), wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(co(c1, c2, c3), c4))
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(c1, c2, c3), c4), wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c3, c4))
  lmodvsubcl(c5, c1, c4, c3, c2)
  lspsnneg(c5, co(c1, c2, c3), c4, c0, cfv(cminusg, c5))
  fveq2d(c0, csn(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c5), co(c1, c2, c3))), csn(co(c3, c2, c1)), w0)
  sneqd(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c5), co(c1, c2, c3)), co(c3, c2, c1), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c5), co(c1, c2, c3)), co(c3, c2, c1)), wcel(c5, cgrp), wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c3, c4))
  syl(w0, wcel(c5, cgrp), wcel(c5, clmod))
  lmodgrp(c5)
  grpinvsub(c5, c1, c4, c3, cfv(cminusg, c5), c2)
  eqid(cfv(cminusg, c5))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lspsnsub(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` {(c1[c2]c3)})=(c0 ` {(c3[c2]c1)}))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(-g ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(LSpan ` c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà LMod)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c4)
} = {
  eqtr3d((c0 ` {(c1[c2]c3)}), (c0 ` {(c3[c2]c1)}), (c0 ` {((invg ` c5)`(c1[c2]c3))}), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ` {((invg ` c5)`(c1[c2]c3))})=(c0 ` {(c1[c2]c3)}), c5 ‚àà LMod, (c1[c2]c3)‚àà c4)
  syl3anc(w0, (c1[c2]c3)‚àà c4, c5 ‚àà LMod, c1 ‚àà c4, c3 ‚àà c4)
  lmodvsubcl(c5, c1, c4, c3, c2)
  lspsnneg(c5, (c1[c2]c3), c4, c0, (invg ` c5))
  fveq2d(c0, {((invg ` c5)`(c1[c2]c3))}, {(c3[c2]c1)}, w0)
  sneqd(((invg ` c5)`(c1[c2]c3)), (c3[c2]c1), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, ((invg ` c5)`(c1[c2]c3))=(c3[c2]c1), c5 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c4, c3 ‚àà c4)
  syl(w0, c5 ‚àà Grp, c5 ‚àà LMod)
  lmodgrp(c5)
  grpinvsub(c5, c1, c4, c3, (invg ` c5), c2)
  eqid((invg ` c5))
}

blocks.name: lsp0
blocks.content: Span of the empty set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm lsp0(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wceq(cfv(c1, emptycls), csn(c2)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clspn, c0))
} = {
  eqssd(cfv(c1, emptycls), csn(c2), wcel(c0, clmod))
  mpdan(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(cfv(c1, emptycls), csn(c2)), wcel(csn(c2), cfv(clss, c0)))
  lsssn0(c0, c2, cfv(clss, c0))
  mp3an3(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(csn(c2), cfv(clss, c0)), wss(cfv(c1, emptycls), csn(c2)), wss(emptycls, csn(c2)))
  0ss(csn(c2))
  lspssp(c0, csn(c2), cfv(clss, c0), emptycls, c1)
  mpdan(wcel(c0, clmod), wss(csn(c2), cfv(c1, emptycls)), wcel(cfv(c1, emptycls), cfv(clss, c0)))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(cfv(c1, emptycls), cfv(clss, c0)), wss(emptycls, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  0ss(cfv(cbs, c0))
  lspcl(c0, emptycls, cfv(cbs, c0), c1, cfv(clss, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  lss0ss(c0, cfv(c1, emptycls), cfv(clss, c0), c2)
  eqid(cfv(clss, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lsp0(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚Üí(c1 ` ‚àÖ)= { c2 })
  ‚ä£ c2 =(0 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(LSpan ` c0)
} = {
  eqssd((c1 ` ‚àÖ), { c2 }, c0 ‚àà LMod)
  mpdan(c0 ‚àà LMod, (c1 ` ‚àÖ)‚äÜ { c2 }, { c2 } ‚àà(LSubSp ` c0))
  lsssn0(c0, c2, (LSubSp ` c0))
  mp3an3(c0 ‚àà LMod, { c2 } ‚àà(LSubSp ` c0), (c1 ` ‚àÖ)‚äÜ { c2 }, ‚àÖ ‚äÜ { c2 })
  0ss({ c2 })
  lspssp(c0, { c2 }, (LSubSp ` c0), emptycls, c1)
  mpdan(c0 ‚àà LMod, { c2 } ‚äÜ(c1 ` ‚àÖ), (c1 ` ‚àÖ)‚àà(LSubSp ` c0))
  mpan2(c0 ‚àà LMod, (c1 ` ‚àÖ)‚àà(LSubSp ` c0), ‚àÖ ‚äÜ(Base ` c0))
  0ss((Base ` c0))
  lspcl(c0, emptycls, (Base ` c0), c1, (LSubSp ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  lss0ss(c0, (c1 ` ‚àÖ), (LSubSp ` c0), c2)
  eqid((LSubSp ` c0))
}

blocks.name: lspun0
blocks.content: The span of a union with the zero subspace. (Contributed by NM, 22-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lspun0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cun(c1, csn(c2))), cfv(c0, c1)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c4))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(clspn, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, clmod))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, c3))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(c0, cun(c1, csn(c2))), cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, cun(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, csn(c2)))), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cun(c1, csn(c2))), cfv(c0, cun(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, csn(c2))))), wcel(c4, clmod), wss(c1, c3), wss(csn(c2), c3))
  snssd(c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, clmod))
  lmod0vcl(c4, c2, c3)
  lspun(c4, c1, c3, csn(c2), c0)
  eqtrd(cfv(c0, cun(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, csn(c2)))), cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, cfv(c0, c1)), w0)
  fveq2d(c0, cun(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, csn(c2))), cfv(c0, c1), w0)
  eqtrd(cun(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, csn(c2))), cfv(c0, c1), cun(cfv(c0, c1), csn(c2)), w0)
  uneq2d(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, csn(c2)), csn(c2), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, csn(c2)), csn(c2)), wcel(c4, clmod))
  lspsn0(c4, c0, c2)
  sylib(w0, wceq(cun(cfv(c0, c1), csn(c2)), cfv(c0, c1)), wss(csn(c2), cfv(c0, c1)))
  syl2anc(w0, wss(csn(c2), cfv(c0, c1)), wcel(c4, clmod), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(clss, c4)))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(clss, c4)), wcel(c4, clmod), wss(c1, c3))
  lspcl(c4, c1, c3, c0, cfv(clss, c4))
  lss0ss(c4, cfv(c0, c1), cfv(clss, c4), c2)
  eqid(cfv(clss, c4))
  ssequn2(csn(c2), cfv(c0, c1))
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c0, c1)), wcel(c4, clmod), wss(c1, c3))
  lspidm(c4, c1, c3, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lspun0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 `(c1 ‚ãÉ { c2 }))=(c0 ` c1))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(0 ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(LSpan ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà LMod)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚äÜ c3)
} = {
  eqtrd((c0 `(c1 ‚ãÉ { c2 })), (c0 ` c1), (c0 `((c0 ` c1)‚ãÉ(c0 ` { c2 }))), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, (c0 `(c1 ‚ãÉ { c2 }))=(c0 `((c0 ` c1)‚ãÉ(c0 ` { c2 }))), c4 ‚àà LMod, c1 ‚äÜ c3, { c2 } ‚äÜ c3)
  snssd(c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, c2 ‚àà c3, c4 ‚àà LMod)
  lmod0vcl(c4, c2, c3)
  lspun(c4, c1, c3, { c2 }, c0)
  eqtrd((c0 `((c0 ` c1)‚ãÉ(c0 ` { c2 }))), (c0 ` c1), (c0 `(c0 ` c1)), w0)
  fveq2d(c0, ((c0 ` c1)‚ãÉ(c0 ` { c2 })), (c0 ` c1), w0)
  eqtrd(((c0 ` c1)‚ãÉ(c0 ` { c2 })), (c0 ` c1), ((c0 ` c1)‚ãÉ { c2 }), w0)
  uneq2d((c0 ` c1), (c0 ` { c2 }), { c2 }, w0)
  syl(w0, (c0 ` { c2 })= { c2 }, c4 ‚àà LMod)
  lspsn0(c4, c0, c2)
  sylib(w0, ((c0 ` c1)‚ãÉ { c2 })=(c0 ` c1), { c2 } ‚äÜ(c0 ` c1))
  syl2anc(w0, { c2 } ‚äÜ(c0 ` c1), c4 ‚àà LMod, (c0 ` c1)‚àà(LSubSp ` c4))
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ` c1)‚àà(LSubSp ` c4), c4 ‚àà LMod, c1 ‚äÜ c3)
  lspcl(c4, c1, c3, c0, (LSubSp ` c4))
  lss0ss(c4, (c0 ` c1), (LSubSp ` c4), c2)
  eqid((LSubSp ` c4))
  ssequn2({ c2 }, (c0 ` c1))
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 `(c0 ` c1))=(c0 ` c1), c4 ‚àà LMod, c1 ‚äÜ c3)
  lspidm(c4, c1, c3, c0)
}

blocks.name: lspsneq0
blocks.content: Span of the singleton is the zero subspace iff the vector is zero. (Contributed by NM, 27-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm lspsneq0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wceq(cfv(c3, csn(c1)), csn(c4)), wceq(c1, c4)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(clspn, c0))
} = {
  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c3, csn(c1)), csn(c4)), wceq(c1, c4))
  syl6(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c3, csn(c1)), csn(c4)), wceq(c1, c4), wcel(c1, csn(c4)))
  syl5ibcom(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c3, csn(c1)), csn(c4)), wcel(c1, csn(c4)), wcel(c1, cfv(c3, csn(c1))))
  lspsnid(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  eleq2(cfv(c3, csn(c1)), csn(c4), c1)
  elsni(c1, c4)
  syl5ibrcom(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(c1, c4), wceq(cfv(c3, csn(c1)), csn(c4)), wceq(cfv(c3, csn(c4)), csn(c4)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(c3, csn(c4)), csn(c4)))
  lspsn0(c0, c3, c4)
  fveqeq2d(c3, csn(c1), csn(c4), csn(c4), wceq(c1, c4))
  sneq(c1, c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lspsneq0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí((c3 ` { c1 })= { c4 } ‚Üî c1 = c4))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(0 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(LSpan ` c0)
} = {
  impbid((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (c3 ` { c1 })= { c4 }, c1 = c4)
  syl6((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (c3 ` { c1 })= { c4 }, c1 = c4, c1 ‚àà { c4 })
  syl5ibcom((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (c3 ` { c1 })= { c4 }, c1 ‚àà { c4 }, c1 ‚àà(c3 ` { c1 }))
  lspsnid(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  eleq2((c3 ` { c1 }), { c4 }, c1)
  elsni(c1, c4)
  syl5ibrcom((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), c1 = c4, (c3 ` { c1 })= { c4 }, (c3 ` { c4 })= { c4 })
  adantr(c0 ‚àà LMod, c1 ‚àà c2, (c3 ` { c4 })= { c4 })
  lspsn0(c0, c3, c4)
  fveqeq2d(c3, { c1 }, { c4 }, { c4 }, c1 = c4)
  sneq(c1, c4)
}

blocks.name: lspsneq0b
blocks.content: Equal singleton spans imply both arguments are zero or both are nonzero. (Contributed by NM, 21-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lspsneq0b(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c1)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(c0g, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(clspn, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, clmod))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c5, csn(c0)), cfv(c5, csn(c2))))
} = {
  impbida(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c1))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)), wceq(c2, c1), wceq(cfv(c5, csn(c2)), csn(c1)))
  eqtr3d(cfv(c5, csn(c2)), csn(c1), cfv(c5, csn(c0)), wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c5, csn(c0)), cfv(c5, csn(c2))))
  biimpar(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c5, csn(c0)), csn(c1)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wb(wceq(cfv(c5, csn(c2)), csn(c1)), wceq(c2, c1)))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wceq(c2, c1)), wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c5, csn(c0)), csn(c1)))
  eqtrd(cfv(c5, csn(c0)), csn(c1), cfv(c5, csn(c2)), wa(w0, wceq(c2, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c2, c1), wceq(cfv(c5, csn(c0)), cfv(c5, csn(c2))))
  biimpar(w0, wceq(c2, c1), wceq(cfv(c5, csn(c2)), csn(c1)))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wceq(cfv(c5, csn(c2)), csn(c1)), wceq(c2, c1)), wcel(c4, clmod), wcel(c2, c3))
  lspsneq0(c4, c2, c3, c5, c1)
  adantr(w0, wceq(c2, c1), wb(wceq(cfv(c5, csn(c0)), csn(c1)), wceq(c0, c1)))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wceq(cfv(c5, csn(c0)), csn(c1)), wceq(c0, c1)), wcel(c4, clmod), wcel(c0, c3))
  lspsneq0(c4, c0, c3, c5, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lspsneq0b(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 = c1 ‚Üî c2 = c1))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(0 ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(LSpan ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà LMod)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c5 ` { c0 })=(c5 ` { c2 }))
} = {
  impbida(w0, c0 = c1, c2 = c1)
  mpbid((w0 ‚àß c0 = c1), c2 = c1, (c5 ` { c2 })= { c1 })
  eqtr3d((c5 ` { c2 }), { c1 }, (c5 ` { c0 }), (w0 ‚àß c0 = c1))
  adantr(w0, c0 = c1, (c5 ` { c0 })=(c5 ` { c2 }))
  biimpar(w0, c0 = c1, (c5 ` { c0 })= { c1 })
  adantr(w0, c0 = c1, ((c5 ` { c2 })= { c1 } ‚Üî c2 = c1))
  mpbid((w0 ‚àß c2 = c1), c0 = c1, (c5 ` { c0 })= { c1 })
  eqtrd((c5 ` { c0 }), { c1 }, (c5 ` { c2 }), (w0 ‚àß c2 = c1))
  adantr(w0, c2 = c1, (c5 ` { c0 })=(c5 ` { c2 }))
  biimpar(w0, c2 = c1, (c5 ` { c2 })= { c1 })
  syl2anc(w0, ((c5 ` { c2 })= { c1 } ‚Üî c2 = c1), c4 ‚àà LMod, c2 ‚àà c3)
  lspsneq0(c4, c2, c3, c5, c1)
  adantr(w0, c2 = c1, ((c5 ` { c0 })= { c1 } ‚Üî c0 = c1))
  syl2anc(w0, ((c5 ` { c0 })= { c1 } ‚Üî c0 = c1), c4 ‚àà LMod, c0 ‚àà c3)
  lspsneq0(c4, c0, c3, c5, c1)
}

blocks.name: lmodindp1
blocks.content: Two independent (non-colinear) vectors have nonzero sum. (Contributed by NM, 22-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lmodindp1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wne(co(c0, c1, c2), c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusg, c5))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(clspn, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, clmod))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wne(cfv(c6, csn(c0)), cfv(c6, csn(c2))))
} = {
  mpd(w0, wne(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), wne(cfv(c6, csn(c0)), cfv(c6, csn(c2))))
  necon3d(cfv(c6, csn(c0)), cfv(c6, csn(c2)), co(c0, c1, c2), c3, w0)
  ex(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), wceq(cfv(c6, csn(c0)), cfv(c6, csn(c2))))
  eqtrd(cfv(c6, csn(c0)), cfv(c6, csn(c2)), cfv(c6, csn(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c5), c0))), wa(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), wceq(cfv(c6, csn(c0)), cfv(c6, csn(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c5), c0)))))
  eqcomd(cfv(c6, csn(c0)), cfv(c6, csn(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c5), c0))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(c6, csn(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c5), c0))), cfv(c6, csn(c0))), wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c0, c4))
  lspsnneg(c5, c0, c4, c6, cfv(cminusg, c5))
  fveq2d(c6, csn(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c5), c0)), csn(c2), wa(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3)))
  sneqd(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c5), c0), c2, wa(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3)))
  biimpar(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), wceq(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c5), c0), c2))
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wceq(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c5), c0), c2), wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3)), wcel(c5, cgrp), wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c4))
  syl(w0, wcel(c5, cgrp), wcel(c5, clmod))
  lmodgrp(c5)
  grpinvid1(c5, c0, c4, c2, cfv(cminusg, c5), c1, c3)
  eqid(cfv(cminusg, c5))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lmodindp1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[c1]c2)‚â† c3)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(+ ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(0 ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(LSpan ` c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà LMod)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c6 ` { c0 })‚â†(c6 ` { c2 }))
} = {
  mpd(w0, (c0[c1]c2)‚â† c3, (c6 ` { c0 })‚â†(c6 ` { c2 }))
  necon3d((c6 ` { c0 }), (c6 ` { c2 }), (c0[c1]c2), c3, w0)
  ex(w0, (c0[c1]c2)= c3, (c6 ` { c0 })=(c6 ` { c2 }))
  eqtrd((c6 ` { c0 }), (c6 ` { c2 }), (c6 ` {((invg ` c5)` c0)}), (w0 ‚àß(c0[c1]c2)= c3))
  adantr(w0, (c0[c1]c2)= c3, (c6 ` { c0 })=(c6 ` {((invg ` c5)` c0)}))
  eqcomd((c6 ` { c0 }), (c6 ` {((invg ` c5)` c0)}), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c6 ` {((invg ` c5)` c0)})=(c6 ` { c0 }), c5 ‚àà LMod, c0 ‚àà c4)
  lspsnneg(c5, c0, c4, c6, (invg ` c5))
  fveq2d(c6, {((invg ` c5)` c0)}, { c2 }, (w0 ‚àß(c0[c1]c2)= c3))
  sneqd(((invg ` c5)` c0), c2, (w0 ‚àß(c0[c1]c2)= c3))
  biimpar(w0, (c0[c1]c2)= c3, ((invg ` c5)` c0)= c2)
  syl3anc(w0, (((invg ` c5)` c0)= c2 ‚Üî(c0[c1]c2)= c3), c5 ‚àà Grp, c0 ‚àà c4, c2 ‚àà c4)
  syl(w0, c5 ‚àà Grp, c5 ‚àà LMod)
  lmodgrp(c5)
  grpinvid1(c5, c0, c4, c2, (invg ` c5), c1, c3)
  eqid((invg ` c5))
}

blocks.name: lsslsp
blocks.content: Spans in submodules correspond to spans in the containing module. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Dec-2014.) TODO: Shouldn't we swap ` M `` G ` and ` N `` G ` since we are computing a property of ` N `` G ` ? (Like we say sin 0 = 0 and not 0 = sin 0.) - NM 15-Mar-2015.
blocks.origin:
thm lsslsp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wceq(cfv(c4, c3), cfv(c5, c3)))
  -| wceq(c6, co(c0, cress, c1))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clspn, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(clspn, c6))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c0))
} = {
  eqssd(cfv(c4, c3), cfv(c5, c3), w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wss(cfv(c4, c3), cfv(c5, c3)), wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(cfv(c5, c3), c2), wss(c3, cfv(c5, c3)))
  simpld(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wcel(cfv(c5, c3), c2), wss(cfv(c5, c3), c1))
  mpbid(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wa(wcel(cfv(c5, c3), c2), wss(cfv(c5, c3), c1)), wcel(cfv(c5, c3), cfv(clss, c6)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wcel(cfv(c5, c3), cfv(clss, c6)), wcel(c6, clmod), wss(c3, cfv(cbs, c6)))
  lspcl(c6, c3, cfv(cbs, c6), c5, cfv(clss, c6))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1), wb(wcel(cfv(c5, c3), cfv(clss, c6)), wa(wcel(cfv(c5, c3), c2), wss(cfv(c5, c3), c1))))
  lsslss(c0, c1, c2, cfv(c5, c3), cfv(clss, c6), c6)
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wss(c3, cfv(c5, c3)), wcel(c6, clmod), wss(c3, cfv(cbs, c6)))
  sseqtrd(c3, cfv(cbs, c6), c1, w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c6)), wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  ressbas2(c1, cfv(cbs, c0), c6, c0)
  lspssid(c6, c3, cfv(cbs, c6), c5)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c6))
  lspssp(c0, cfv(c5, c3), c2, c3, c4)
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wss(cfv(c5, c3), cfv(c4, c3)), wcel(c6, clmod), wcel(cfv(c4, c3), cfv(clss, c6)), wss(c3, cfv(c4, c3)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1), wcel(c6, clmod))
  lsslmod(c0, c1, c2, c6)
  mpbir2and(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wcel(cfv(c4, c3), cfv(clss, c6)), wcel(cfv(c4, c3), c2), wss(cfv(c4, c3), c1))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wcel(cfv(c4, c3), c2), wcel(c0, clmod), wss(c3, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  lspcl(c0, c3, cfv(cbs, c0), c4, c2)
  lspssp(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  3adant3(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1), wb(wcel(cfv(c4, c3), cfv(clss, c6)), wa(wcel(cfv(c4, c3), c2), wss(cfv(c4, c3), c1))))
  lsslss(c0, c1, c2, cfv(c4, c3), cfv(clss, c6), c6)
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wss(c3, cfv(c4, c3)), wcel(c0, clmod), wss(c3, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1))
  sstrd(c3, cfv(cbs, c0), c1, w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)))
  simp3(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1), wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  lssss(c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c0), c0)
  lspssid(c0, c3, cfv(cbs, c0), c4)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  lspssp(c6, cfv(c4, c3), cfv(clss, c6), c3, c5)
  eqid(cfv(clss, c6))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lsslsp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1)‚Üí(c4 ` c3)=(c5 ` c3))
  ‚ä£ c6 =(c0[|`s]c1)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(LSpan ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(LSpan ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(LSubSp ` c0)
} = {
  eqssd((c4 ` c3), (c5 ` c3), (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1))
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1), (c4 ` c3)‚äÜ(c5 ` c3), c0 ‚àà LMod, (c5 ` c3)‚àà c2, c3 ‚äÜ(c5 ` c3))
  simpld((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1), (c5 ` c3)‚àà c2, (c5 ` c3)‚äÜ c1)
  mpbid((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1), ((c5 ` c3)‚àà c2 ‚àß(c5 ` c3)‚äÜ c1), (c5 ` c3)‚àà(LSubSp ` c6))

blocks.name: lss0v
blocks.content: The zero vector in a submodule equals the zero vector in the including module. (Contributed by NM, 15-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lss0v(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(c3, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, co(c0, cress, c1))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c0))
} = {
  3eqtr3g(c3, c4, cuni(csn(c3)), cuni(csn(c4)), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)))
  unieqd(csn(c3), csn(c4), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)))
  3eqtr3rd(csn(c3), csn(c4), cfv(cfv(clspn, c0), emptycls), cfv(cfv(clspn, c5), emptycls), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)))
  mp3an3(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cfv(clspn, c0), emptycls), cfv(cfv(clspn, c5), emptycls)), wss(emptycls, c1))
  0ss(c1)
  lsslsp(c0, c1, c2, emptycls, cfv(clspn, c0), cfv(clspn, c5), c5)
  adantr(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cfv(clspn, c0), emptycls), csn(c4)))
  lsp0(c0, cfv(clspn, c0), c4)
  eqid(cfv(clspn, c0))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(cfv(clspn, c5), emptycls), csn(c3)), wcel(c5, clmod))
  lsslmod(c0, c1, c2, c5)
  lsp0(c5, cfv(clspn, c5), c3)
  eqid(cfv(clspn, c5))
  unisn(c3)
  fvexi(c3, c0g, c5)
  unisn(c4)
  fvexi(c4, c0g, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lss0v(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí c3 = c4)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(c0[|`s]c1)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(0 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(0 ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(LSubSp ` c0)
} = {
  3eqtr3g(c3, c4, ‚ãÉ { c3 }, ‚ãÉ { c4 }, (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  unieqd({ c3 }, { c4 }, (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  3eqtr3rd({ c3 }, { c4 }, ((LSpan ` c0)` ‚àÖ), ((LSpan ` c5)` ‚àÖ), (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  mp3an3(c0 ‚àà LMod, c1 ‚àà c2, ((LSpan ` c0)` ‚àÖ)=((LSpan ` c5)` ‚àÖ), ‚àÖ ‚äÜ c1)
  0ss(c1)
  lsslsp(c0, c1, c2, emptycls, (LSpan ` c0), (LSpan ` c5), c5)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà LMod, c1 ‚àà c2, ((LSpan ` c0)` ‚àÖ)= { c4 })
  lsp0(c0, (LSpan ` c0), c4)
  eqid((LSpan ` c0))
  syl((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), ((LSpan ` c5)` ‚àÖ)= { c3 }, c5 ‚àà LMod)
  lsslmod(c0, c1, c2, c5)
  lsp0(c5, (LSpan ` c5), c3)
  eqid((LSpan ` c5))
  unisn(c3)
  fvexi(c3, c0g, c5)
  unisn(c4)
  fvexi(c4, c0g, c0)
}

blocks.name: lsppropd
blocks.content: If two structures have the same components (properties), they have the same span function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Feb-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.)

thm lsppropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(clspn, c0), cfv(clspn, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cvsca, c0), cv(s1)), c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cvsca, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cvsca, c1), cv(s1))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))))

} = {

thm lsppropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(LSpan ` c0)=(LSpan ` c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 =(Base ` c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 =(Base ` c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚äÜ c3)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3))‚Üí(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2))‚Üí(s0[(√ó ` c0)]s1)‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2))‚Üí(s0[(√ó ` c0)]s1)=(s0[(√ó ` c1)]s1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 =(Base `(Scalar ` c0)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 =(Base `(Scalar ` c1)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4d((LSpan ` c0), (LSpan ` c1), (hs0 ‚àà P((Base ` c0))‚Ü¶ ‚ãÇ { hs1 ‚àà(LSubSp ` c0)| hs0 ‚äÜ hs1 }), (hs0 ‚àà P((Base ` c1))‚Ü¶ ‚ãÇ { hs1 ‚àà(LSubSp ` c1)| hs0 ‚äÜ hs1 }), w0)
  mpteq12dv(hs0, P((Base ` c0)), ‚ãÇ { hs1 ‚àà(LSubSp ` c0)| hs0 ‚äÜ hs1 }, P((Base ` c1)), ‚ãÇ { hs1 ‚àà(LSubSp ` c1)| hs0 ‚äÜ hs1 }, w0)
  pweqd((Base ` c0), (Base ` c1), w0)
  eqtr3d((Base ` c0), (Base ` c1), c2, w0)
  inteqd({ hs1 ‚àà(LSubSp ` c0)| hs0 ‚äÜ hs1 }, { hs1 ‚àà(LSubSp ` c1)| hs0 ‚äÜ hs1 }, w0)
  syl(w0, { hs1 ‚àà(LSubSp ` c0)| hs0 ‚äÜ hs1 } = { hs1 ‚àà(LSubSp ` c1)| hs0 ‚äÜ hs1 }, (LSubSp ` c0)=(LSubSp ` c1))
  lsspropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  rabeq(hs1, (LSubSp ` c0), (LSubSp ` c1), hs0 ‚äÜ hs1)
  syl(w0, (LSpan ` c0)=(hs0 ‚àà P((Base ` c0))‚Ü¶ ‚ãÇ { hs1 ‚àà(LSubSp ` c0)| hs0 ‚äÜ hs1 }), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  lspfval(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, (LSpan ` c0), (Base ` c0), (LSubSp ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((LSubSp ` c0))
  eqid((LSpan ` c0))
  syl(w0, (LSpan ` c1)=(hs0 ‚àà P((Base ` c1))‚Ü¶ ‚ãÇ { hs1 ‚àà(LSubSp ` c1)| hs0 ‚äÜ hs1 }), c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  lspfval(hs0, hs1, c1, universe, (LSpan ` c1), (Base ` c1), (LSubSp ` c1))
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  eqid((LSubSp ` c1))
  eqid((LSpan ` c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.c((LSubSp ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c((LSubSp ` c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c((LSubSp ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c1))
  diff.hs0.c((LSubSp ` c1))
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c1))
}
